title: How to Make Nadru Yakhni (Lotus Root with Yoghurt)

steps.headline: Take 2 cups of yoghurt and beat with a whisk until smooth.
steps.description: Add 1 cup of water and add to a heavy bottomed pan. Let it come to a boil stirring constantly. Once boiling reduce the heat and let it cook until it has thickened and reduce to half. You will have to whisk occasionally.

steps.headline: Wash and lotus root and then slice in 1 inch (2.5 cm) pieces diagonally.
steps.description: The root usually has some mud in it so be sure to wash it out really well.

steps.headline: Pressure cook the the pieces for about 10 minutes.
Fry one onion until gold brown and blend to make a paste.
In a heavy bottom pan, add 2 tsp of ghee, 2 tsp ginger powder, 2 tsp fennel powder, 4 whole black cardamon, 8 green cardamon, 8 whole cloves, 4 pieces of cinnamon, salt and the onion paste.
Add the cooked yoghurt and let it simmer for about 10 minutes
Cook for about 30 -40 mins until the gravy has thickened.
Add crushed dry mint and black jeera.
Remove from heat and serve with rice
